job description:
eBay is the worlds leading online marketplace for the trade of goods and services by a diverse community of individuals and businesses. The Risk Policy Management team is responsible for creating and implementing risk policies to identify, assess, and manage exposures and undesirable outcomes.

We are currently looking for a Data Analyst to lead Risk and Payment analytics initiatives supporting various Risk teams. Candidates should provide a strategic perspective, sound business judgement, strong analytic capabilities, and a collaborative partnership. Candidates should make an impact in our fast-paced work environment with multiple complex projects to balance on a regular basis. Successful candidates will bring passion to do what is right for the business and work effectively with the business unit partners to collaborate and build out winning solutions together.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Design, plan, and execute analyses and A/B tests as necessary
  • Create and maintain dashboards providing visibility into business/team performance
  • Extract, analyze and collate data from a variety of sources to create both regular and ad hoc reporting
  • Perform analytics on data to generate business/team insights
  • Lead analytics planning, execution and engagement on multiple initiatives
  • Monitor and measure team performance against key metrics
Job Requirements
  • Demonstrate critical thinking and problem solving skills. Creative thinker; able to develop unique methods of analysis where traditional methods do not yield results
  • Excellent reporting and business analysis skills
  • Ability to adapt and learn new technologies/methodologies
  • Ability to identify, collect and organize data from a variety of sources and formats
  • Expert with Excel (pivot tables, advance functions, statistics)
  • Superior skills with database query tools (e.g., SQL); Teradata experience a plus.
  • Experience with SAS, UNIX and Tableau will be advantageous
  • Ability to thrive in a cross-functional environment while juggling multiple responsibilities
  • Trust, initiative, integrity and exceptional communication skills are a must
  • Ability to translate advanced analytics approaches for non-technical audiences
Education

Bachelors degree in Mathematics/Statistics, Engineering/Computer Science, Economics or equivalent.
